source: Use /LookControls/ while holding /LeftFlipper/ to switch targets.
translation: Use /LookControls/ while holding /LeftFlipper/ to switch targets.

source: When your MENTAL FOCUS is LOCKED, press /AButton/ and use /MovementControls/ in any direction. Very useful for circling your enemies!
translation: When your MENTAL FOCUS is LOCKED, press /AButton/ and use /MovementControls/ in any direction. Very useful for circling your enemies!
